thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Xinguang Pharmaceutical sees FY 2017 net profit down 5 pct to 15 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Xinguang Pharmaceutical sees FY 2017 net profit down 5 pct to 15 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - zhejiang xinguang pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 30(Reuters) - Zhejiang Xinguang Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 5 percent to 15 percent, or to be 101.1 million yuan to 113 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 119 million yuan
* Says price rise in original auxiliary materials is the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/b2eFtz
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
